mapper.select:
select * from ( select b.*, rownum rn from ( select t.itemnumber,t.PRODUCT_IMG_URL,t.BRAND_ID,t.YEAR,to_char(FIRST_SELL_STATE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as FIRST_SELL_STATE_DATE, nvl(t1.count,0)count, nvl(t2.lastcount,0)lastcount, nvl(t3.PRODUCT_TOTAL_MONEY,0)PRODUCT_TOTAL_MONEY, nvl(t4.last_PRODUCT_TOTAL_MONEY,0)last_PRODUCT_TOTAL_MONEY, trunc(nvl(t5.return_rate,0)*100,2) return_rate, trunc(nvl(t6.last_return_rate,0)*100,2) last_return_rate, nvl(t0.cart_count,0)cart_count, nvl(t3.product_count,0)product_count, nvl(t4.last_product_count,0)last_product_count, nvl(t5.return_num,0)return_num, nvl(t6.last_return_num,0)last_return_num, 0 product_type from tbl_product_info t left join ( SELECT tps.product_itemnumber,SUM (COUNT) cart_count FROM tbl_product_sku tps,TBL_USER_CART tuc WHERE tps.id = tuc.product_sku_id GROUP BY tps.product_itemnumber)t0 on t.itemnumber = t0.product_itemnumber left join (select a.itemnumber, b.count from tbl_product_info a, (select page_name, count(1) count from tbl_user_log_info where page_type = '商品详情'
AND create_date BETWEEN to_date(#{start_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND to_date(#{end_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
group by page_name) b where a.itemnumber = b.page_name) t1 on t.itemnumber = t1.itemnumber left join (select a.itemnumber, c.lastcount from tbl_product_info a, (select page_name, count(1) lastcount from tbl_user_log_info where page_type = '商品详情'
AND create_date BETWEEN to_date(#{last_start_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND to_date(#{last_end_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
group by page_name) c where a.itemnumber = c.page_name) t2 on t.itemnumber = t2.itemnumber left join ( select a.itemnumber, b.PRODUCT_TOTAL_MONEY, b.product_count from tbl_product_info a, (select b.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER, sum(b.PRODUCT_TOTAL_MONEY) PRODUCT_TOTAL_MONEY, sum(b.count)product_count from TBL_ORDER_PRODUCT_SKU b, tbl_order_info c where b.ORDER_NUMBER = c.ORDER_NUMBER
AND PAYMENT_DATE BETWEEN to_date(#{start_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND to_date(#{end_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
group by b.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER) b where itemnumber = b.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER )t3 on t.itemnumber = t3.itemnumber left join ( select a.itemnumber, b.last_PRODUCT_TOTAL_MONEY, b.last_product_count from tbl_product_info a, (select b.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER, sum(PRODUCT_TOTAL_MONEY) last_PRODUCT_TOTAL_MONEY, sum(b.count)last_product_count from TBL_ORDER_PRODUCT_SKU b, tbl_order_info c where b.ORDER_NUMBER = c.ORDER_NUMBER
AND PAYMENT_DATE BETWEEN to_date(#{last_start_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND to_date(#{last_end_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
group by b.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER) b where itemnumber = b.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER )t4 on t.itemnumber = t4.itemnumber left join ( select t3.*,case when nvl(t3.sale_num,0)=0 then 0 else (t3.RETURN_NUM/t3.sale_num) end return_rate from ( select pi.ITEMNUMBER, NVL(t1.RETURN_NUM,0) RETURN_NUM, NVL(t2.sale_num,0) sale_num from TBL_PRODUCT_info pi left join (select PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER,sum(RETURN_NUM) RETURN_NUM from (SELECT PS.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER,a.PRODUCT_SKU,count(A.PRODUCT_UNIQUE_CODE) RETURN_NUM FROM ${jdbc_user}.TBL_NEW_RETURN_CONFIRM a left join ${jdbc_user}.TBL_NEW_RETURN_ORDER b on a.RETURN_NUMBER = b.RETURN_NUMBER left join TBL_PRODUCT_SKU ps on ps.ID = a.PRODUCT_SKU WHERE a.return_flag = 1
AND REFUND_DATE BETWEEN to_date(#{start_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND to_date(#{end_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
GROUP BY PS.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER,a.PRODUCT_SKU) temp group by PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER ) t1 on PI.ITEMNUMBER = t1.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER left join (select ITEMNUMBER,sum(PRODUCT_COUNT) sale_num from tbl_order_product group by ITEMNUMBER) t2 on PI.ITEMNUMBER = t2.ITEMNUMBER)t3 where t3.RETURN_NUM !=0 or t3.sale_num!=0 )t5 on t.itemnumber = t5.itemnumber left join ( select t3.*,case when nvl(t3.sale_num,0)=0 then 0 else (t3.LAST_RETURN_NUM/t3.sale_num) end last_return_rate from ( select pi.ITEMNUMBER, NVL(t1.RETURN_NUM,0) LAST_RETURN_NUM, NVL(t2.sale_num,0) sale_num from TBL_PRODUCT_info pi left join (select PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER,sum(RETURN_NUM) RETURN_NUM from (SELECT PS.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER,a.PRODUCT_SKU,count(A.PRODUCT_UNIQUE_CODE) RETURN_NUM FROM ${jdbc_user}.TBL_NEW_RETURN_CONFIRM a left join ${jdbc_user}.TBL_NEW_RETURN_ORDER b on a.RETURN_NUMBER = b.RETURN_NUMBER left join TBL_PRODUCT_SKU ps on ps.ID = a.PRODUCT_SKU WHERE a.return_flag = 1
AND REFUND_DATE BETWEEN to_date(#{last_start_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND to_date(#{last_end_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
GROUP BY PS.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER,a.PRODUCT_SKU) temp group by PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER ) t1 on PI.ITEMNUMBER = t1.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER left join (select ITEMNUMBER,sum(PRODUCT_COUNT) sale_num from tbl_order_product group by ITEMNUMBER) t2 on PI.ITEMNUMBER = t2.ITEMNUMBER)t3 where t3.LAST_RETURN_NUM !=0 or t3.sale_num!=0 )t6 on t.itemnumber = t6.itemnumber
t.PRODUCT_TYPE = 0
and t.brand_id=#{brand_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and t.year=#{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and t.season_id=#{season_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and t.itemnumber like '%'||#{itemnumber}||'%'
and (t.product_type_id = #{product_type_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} or t.product_type_id in (select id from tbl_dic_product_type start with parent_id = #{product_type_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} connect by prior id=parent_id))
order by ${sort} ${sort_by} ,itemnumber
) b where rownum <= #{end_rownum}) where rn > #{start_rownum}

select '浏览量' type_name,count(1) cnt,TO_CHAR (a.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') create_date from TBL_USER_LOG_INFO a,tbl_product_info t
t.itemnumber = a.page_name and a.page_type = '商品详情' and t.itemnumber=#{itemnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and a.CREATE_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{start_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY-MM-DD')
and a.CREATE_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{end_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY-MM-DD')
group by TO_CHAR (a.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UNION ALL select '已售商品数' type_name ,b.PRODUCT_COUNT cnt,PAYMENT_DATE create_date from tbl_product_info a, (select b.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER, TO_CHAR (PAYMENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')PAYMENT_DATE, sum(b.count)product_count from TBL_ORDER_PRODUCT_SKU b, tbl_order_info c where b.ORDER_NUMBER = c.ORDER_NUMBER
AND PAYMENT_DATE BETWEEN to_date(#{start_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND to_date(#{end_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
group by b.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER,TO_CHAR (c.PAYMENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) b where itemnumber = b.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER and a.ITEMNUMBER=#{itemnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select * from ( select b.*, rownum rn from ( select t.itemnumber,t.PRODUCT_IMG_URL,t.BRAND_ID,t.YEAR,to_char(FIRST_SELL_STATE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as FIRST_SELL_STATE_DATE, nvl(t1.count,0)count, nvl(t2.lastcount,0)lastcount, nvl(t3.PRODUCT_TOTAL_MONEY,0)PRODUCT_TOTAL_MONEY, nvl(t4.last_PRODUCT_TOTAL_MONEY,0)last_PRODUCT_TOTAL_MONEY, trunc(nvl(t5.return_rate,0)*100,2) return_rate, trunc(nvl(t6.last_return_rate,0)*100,2) last_return_rate, nvl(t0.cart_count,0)cart_count, nvl(t3.product_count,0)product_count, nvl(t4.last_product_count,0)last_product_count, nvl(t5.return_num,0)return_num, nvl(t6.last_return_num,0)last_return_num, 3 product_type from tbl_pvtp_product_info t left join ( SELECT tps.product_itemnumber,SUM (COUNT) cart_count FROM tbl_pvtp_product_sku tps,TBL_USER_CART tuc WHERE tps.id = tuc.product_sku_id GROUP BY tps.product_itemnumber)t0 on t.itemnumber = t0.product_itemnumber left join (select a.itemnumber, b.count from tbl_pvtp_product_info a, (select page_name, count(1) count from tbl_user_log_info where page_type = '商品详情'
AND create_date BETWEEN to_date(#{start_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND to_date(#{end_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
group by page_name) b where a.itemnumber = b.page_name) t1 on t.itemnumber = t1.itemnumber left join (select a.itemnumber, c.lastcount from tbl_pvtp_product_info a, (select page_name, count(1) lastcount from tbl_user_log_info where page_type = '商品详情'
AND create_date BETWEEN to_date(#{last_start_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND to_date(#{last_end_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
group by page_name) c where a.itemnumber = c.page_name) t2 on t.itemnumber = t2.itemnumber left join ( select a.itemnumber, b.PRODUCT_TOTAL_MONEY, b.product_count from tbl_pvtp_product_info a, (select b.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER, sum(b.PRODUCT_TOTAL_MONEY) PRODUCT_TOTAL_MONEY, sum(b.count)product_count from TBL_ORDER_PRODUCT_SKU b, tbl_order_info c where b.ORDER_NUMBER = c.ORDER_NUMBER
AND PAYMENT_DATE BETWEEN to_date(#{start_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND to_date(#{end_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
group by b.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER) b where itemnumber = b.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER )t3 on t.itemnumber = t3.itemnumber left join ( select a.itemnumber, b.last_PRODUCT_TOTAL_MONEY, b.last_product_count from tbl_pvtp_product_info a, (select b.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER, sum(PRODUCT_TOTAL_MONEY) last_PRODUCT_TOTAL_MONEY, sum(b.count)last_product_count from TBL_ORDER_PRODUCT_SKU b, tbl_order_info c where b.ORDER_NUMBER = c.ORDER_NUMBER
AND PAYMENT_DATE BETWEEN to_date(#{last_start_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND to_date(#{last_end_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
group by b.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER) b where itemnumber = b.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER )t4 on t.itemnumber = t4.itemnumber left join ( select t3.*,case when nvl(t3.sale_num,0)=0 then 0 else (t3.RETURN_NUM/t3.sale_num) end return_rate from ( select pi.ITEMNUMBER, NVL(t1.RETURN_NUM,0) RETURN_NUM, NVL(t2.sale_num,0) sale_num from tbl_pvtp_product_info pi left join (select PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER,sum(RETURN_NUM) RETURN_NUM from (SELECT PS.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER,a.PRODUCT_SKU,count(A.PRODUCT_UNIQUE_CODE) RETURN_NUM FROM ${jdbc_user}.TBL_NEW_RETURN_CONFIRM a inner join ${jdbc_user}.TBL_NEW_RETURN_ORDER b on a.RETURN_NUMBER = b.RETURN_NUMBER left join TBL_PRODUCT_SKU ps on ps.ID = a.PRODUCT_SKU WHERE a.return_flag = 1 and b.stationed_user_id is null
AND REFUND_DATE BETWEEN to_date(#{start_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND to_date(#{end_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
GROUP BY PS.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER,a.PRODUCT_SKU) temp group by PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER ) t1 on PI.ITEMNUMBER = t1.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER left join (select ITEMNUMBER,sum(PRODUCT_COUNT) sale_num from tbl_order_product group by ITEMNUMBER) t2 on PI.ITEMNUMBER = t2.ITEMNUMBER)t3 where t3.RETURN_NUM !=0 or t3.sale_num!=0 )t5 on t.itemnumber = t5.itemnumber left join ( select t3.*,case when nvl(t3.sale_num,0)=0 then 0 else (t3.LAST_RETURN_NUM/t3.sale_num) end last_return_rate from ( select pi.ITEMNUMBER, NVL(t1.RETURN_NUM,0) LAST_RETURN_NUM, NVL(t2.sale_num,0) sale_num from tbl_pvtp_product_info pi left join (select PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER,sum(RETURN_NUM) RETURN_NUM from (SELECT PS.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER,a.PRODUCT_SKU,count(A.PRODUCT_UNIQUE_CODE) RETURN_NUM FROM ${jdbc_user}.TBL_NEW_RETURN_CONFIRM a inner join ${jdbc_user}.TBL_NEW_RETURN_ORDER b on a.RETURN_NUMBER = b.RETURN_NUMBER left join TBL_PRODUCT_SKU ps on ps.ID = a.PRODUCT_SKU WHERE a.return_flag = 1 and b.stationed_user_id is null
AND REFUND_DATE BETWEEN to_date(#{last_start_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND to_date(#{last_end_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
GROUP BY PS.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER,a.PRODUCT_SKU) temp group by PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER ) t1 on PI.ITEMNUMBER = t1.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER left join (select ITEMNUMBER,sum(PRODUCT_COUNT) sale_num from tbl_order_product group by ITEMNUMBER) t2 on PI.ITEMNUMBER = t2.ITEMNUMBER)t3 where t3.LAST_RETURN_NUM !=0 or t3.sale_num!=0 )t6 on t.itemnumber = t6.itemnumber
1=1
and t.brand_id=#{brand_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and t.year=#{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and t.season_id=#{season_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and t.itemnumber like '%'||#{itemnumber}||'%'
order by ${sort} ${sort_by} ,itemnumber
) b where rownum <= #{end_rownum}) where rn > #{start_rownum}

select '浏览量' type_name,count(1) cnt,TO_CHAR (a.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') create_date from TBL_USER_LOG_INFO a,tbl_pvtp_product_info t
t.itemnumber = a.page_name and a.page_type = '商品详情' and t.itemnumber=#{itemnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and a.CREATE_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{start_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY-MM-DD')
and a.CREATE_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{end_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY-MM-DD')
group by TO_CHAR (a.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UNION ALL select '已售商品数' type_name ,b.PRODUCT_COUNT cnt,PAYMENT_DATE create_date from tbl_pvtp_product_info a, (select b.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER, TO_CHAR (PAYMENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')PAYMENT_DATE, sum(b.count)product_count from TBL_ORDER_PRODUCT_SKU b, tbl_order_info c where b.ORDER_NUMBER = c.ORDER_NUMBER
AND PAYMENT_DATE BETWEEN to_date(#{start_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND to_date(#{end_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
group by b.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER,TO_CHAR (c.PAYMENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) b where itemnumber = b.PRODUCT_ITEMNUMBER and a.ITEMNUMBER=#{itemnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
